name: INFERNAL ROUTINE
description:
Controls:

WASD - move,

Space - liberate souls,

E - use swapper,

R - restart level,

M - mute sounds

Do you think dwelling in pandemonium is horrible? Hell, yes, especially when it is your job. You will have to take the responsibilities of the demon: collect sinners's souls and deliver them to the punishment spot.

Game for  Weekly Game Jam.

Week: 139.

Theme: 'Followers'.

Game-name: INFERNAL ROUTINE
